subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Jered Weaver pitched three-hit ball over eight innings and Vladimir Guerrero hit a go-ahead home run in the sixth to lead the visiting Los Angeles Angels over the Chicago White Sox, 2-0, on Saturday.
snippet: Jered Weaver pitched three-hit ball over eight innings and Vladimir Guerrero hit a go-ahead home run in the sixth to lead the visiting Los Angeles Angels over the Chicago White Sox, 2-0, on Saturday.
